Manual_Student_CohortObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Manual_Student_CohortObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Manual_Student_CohortObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_Cohort_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The Academic Unit Reference must be an Academic Unit.

validation.validation: The Institution for the Academic Unit on this Student Cohort must match that for the Student Cohort Type.
Specify a different name. A cohort with this name already exists for the academic unit: [name].
